english.segment1: Living for You. Living for You. Living for You
english.segment2: Hungry I come to You. For I know You satisfy. I am empty but I know. Your love does not run dry
english.segment3: So I wait for You. So I wait for You
english.segment4: I'm falling on my knees. Offering all of me. Jesus You're all. This heart is living for
english.segment5: Broken I run to You. For Your arms are open wide. I am weary but I know Your touch. Restores my life
english.segment6: So I wait for You. So I wait for You
english.segment7: Im falling. Im falling for You. Jesus Youre all. This heart is living for
